document_data.name: Karsel'lyn Lylyl-Lytherraias
document_data.mainbody: '''Karsel'lyn Lylyl-Lytherraias''' was a [[drow]] cleric of [[Eilistraee]] in [[Evermeet]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.History: Karsel'lyn had worked for years as an agent of Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]] among drow. In 1367 DR, she settled in Evermeet to discuss how drow could participate in the [[Retreat]]. Her presence on the isle was known only to the queen and the high mage [[Laeroth Runemaster]]. The queen knew that [[sun elf]] Houses would never accept drow on Evermeet.
document_data.Personality: Karsel'lyn was a graceful individual and the perfect representative of how a good-oriented drow could be. She was impulsive, chaotic, intense, flirtatious, and somewhat fickle.
document_data.Rumors: Some said that Karsel'lyn was romantically interested in the [[human]] buccaneer [[Carreigh Macumail]].
